Comment: This command info is generated from fig
Name: ffmpeg
Description: Play, record, convert, and stream audio and video

Arguments.Name: -sources
Arguments.Description: List sources of the input device

Arguments.Name: -sinks
Arguments.Description: List sinks of the output device

Arguments.Name: -max_alloc
Arguments.Description: Set maximum size of a single allocated block

Arguments.Name: -max_error_rate
Arguments.Description: Ratio of decoding errors (0.0: no errors, 1.0: 100% errors) above which ffmpeg returns an error instead of success

Arguments.Name: -recast_media
Arguments.Description: Allow recasting stream type in order to force a decoder of different media type

Arguments.Name: -stdin
Arguments.Description: Enable or disable interaction on standard input

Arguments.Name: -timelimit
Arguments.Description: Set max runtime in seconds in CPU user time

Arguments.Name: -hex
Arguments.Description: When dumping packets, also dump the payload

Arguments.Name: -vsync
Arguments.Description: Set video sync method globally; deprecated, use -fps_mode

Arguments.Name: -start_at_zero
Arguments.Description: Shift input timestamps to start at 0 when using copyts

Arguments.Name: -copytb
Arguments.Description: Copy input stream time base when stream copying

Arguments.Name: -abort_on
Arguments.Description: Abort on the specified condition flags

Arguments.Name: -filter_complex_script
Arguments.Description: Read complex filtergraph description from a file

Arguments.Name: -stats_period
Arguments.Description: Set the period at which ffmpeg updates stats and -progress output

Arguments.Name: -vstats
Arguments.Description: Dump video coding statistics to file

Arguments.Name: -vstats_file
Arguments.Description: Dump video coding statistics to file

Arguments.Name: -vstats_version
Arguments.Description: Version of the vstats format to use

Arguments.Name: -sdp_file
Arguments.Description: Specify a file in which to print sdp information

Arguments.Name: -filter_hw_device
Arguments.Description: Set hardware device used when filtering

Arguments.Name: -map_metadata
Arguments.Description: Set metadata information of outfile from infile

Arguments.Name: t
Arguments.Description: Record or transcode "duration" seconds of audio/video

Arguments.Name: -fs
Arguments.Description: Set the limit file size in bytes

Arguments.Name: -sseof
Arguments.Description: Set the start time offset relative to EOF

Arguments.Name: -timestamp
Arguments.Description: Set the recording timestamp ('now' to set the current time)

Arguments.Name: -target
Arguments.Description: Specify target file type ("vcd", "svcd", "dvd", "dv" or "dv50" with optional prefixes "pal-", "ntsc-" or "film-")

Arguments.Name: -frames
Arguments.Description: Set the number of frames to output

Arguments.Name: -filter_script
Arguments.Description: Read stream filtergraph description from a file

Arguments.Name: -reinit_filter
Arguments.Description: Reinit filtergraph on input parameter changes

Arguments.Name: -map_channel
Arguments.Description: Map an audio channel from one stream to another

Arguments.Name: -isync
Arguments.Description: Indicate the input index for sync reference

Arguments.Name: -dframes
Arguments.Description: Set the number of data frames to output

Arguments.Name: -re
Arguments.Description: Read input at native frame rate; equivalent to -readrate 1

Arguments.Name: -copypriorss
Arguments.Description: Copy or discard frames before start time

Arguments.Name: -attach
Arguments.Description: Add an attachment to the output file

Arguments.Name: -dump_attachment
Arguments.Description: Extract an attachment into a file

Arguments.Name: -stream_loop
Arguments.Description: Set number of times input stream shall be looped

Arguments.Name: -thread_queue_size
Arguments.Description: Set the maximum number of queued packets from the demuxer

Arguments.Name: -find_stream_info
Arguments.Description: Read and decode the streams to fill missing information with heuristics

Arguments.Name: -bits_per_raw_sample
Arguments.Description: Set the number of bits per raw sample

Arguments.Name: -autoscale
Arguments.Description: Automatically insert a scale filter at the end of the filter graph

Arguments.Name: -time_base
Arguments.Description: Set the desired time base hint for output stream (1:24, 1:48000 or 0.04166, 2.0833e-5)

Arguments.Name: -enc_time_base
Arguments.Description: Set the desired time base for the encoder (1:24, 1:48000 or 0.04166, 2.0833e-5). two special values are defined - 0 = use frame rate (video) or sample rate (audio),-1 = match source time base

Arguments.Name: -bsf
Arguments.Description: A comma-separated list of bitstream filters

Arguments.Name: -fpre
Arguments.Description: Set options from indicated preset file

Arguments.Name: -max_muxing_queue_size
Arguments.Description: Maximum number of packets that can be buffered while waiting for all streams to initialize

Arguments.Name: -muxing_queue_data_threshold
Arguments.Description: Set the threshold after which max_muxing_queue_size is taken into account

Arguments.Name: -dcodec
Arguments.Description: Force data codec ('copy' to copy stream)

Arguments.Name: -vframes
Arguments.Description: Set the number of video frames to output

Arguments.Name: r
Arguments.Description: Set frame rate (Hz value, fraction or abbreviation)

Arguments.Name: -fpsmax
Arguments.Description: Set max frame rate (Hz value, fraction or abbreviation)

Arguments.Name: -vcodec
Arguments.Description: Force video codec ('copy' to copy stream)

Arguments.Name: -rc_override
Arguments.Description: Rate control override for specific intervals

Arguments.Name: -passlogfile
Arguments.Description: Select two pass log file name prefix

Arguments.Name: -fps_mode
Arguments.Description: Set framerate mode for matching video streams; overrides vsync

Arguments.Name: -force_fps
Arguments.Description: Force the selected framerate, disable the best supported framerate selection

Arguments.Name: -streamid
Arguments.Description: Set the value of an outfile streamid

Arguments.Name: -force_key_frames
Arguments.Description: Force key frames at specified timestamps

Arguments.Name: -hwaccel_device
Arguments.Description: Select a device for HW acceleration

Arguments.Name: -hwaccel_output_format
Arguments.Description: Select output format used with HW accelerated decoding

Arguments.Name: -vpre
Arguments.Description: Set the video options to the indicated preset

Arguments.Name: -aframes
Arguments.Description: Set the number of audio frames to output

Arguments.Name: -acodec
Arguments.Description: Force audio codec ('copy' to copy stream)

Arguments.Name: -guess_layout_max
Arguments.Description: Set the maximum number of channels to try to guess the channel layout

Arguments.Name: -apre
Arguments.Description: Set the audio options to the indicated preset

Arguments.Name: -scodec
Arguments.Description: Force subtitle codec ('copy' to copy stream)

Arguments.Name: -spre
Arguments.Description: Set the subtitle options to the indicated preset
